data.title: RM of Invergordon
data.meta_description: Official website for the RM of Invergordon, Saskatchewan. Rural Municipality No. 430 was formed in 1911 and given the name Invergordon.  It is said to have been chosen as homage to a Scottish town where the original settlers may have originated from.
data.text:
Please direct inquiries to the RM Office during office hours, or send us an email anytime and we will respond at our earliest convenience.

If you'd like to reach a member of Council, please go to our Municipal Profile.

All custom work requests must be directed to the RM Office.

Office Hours

Monday - Friday

9:00am - 4:00pm

Open during lunch hour

Closed all Statutory Holidays

Public Works Hours

SUMMER

Monday - Thursday 6:00am - 5:00pm

Fridays 6:00am - 11:00am

WINTER

Monday - Thursday 7:00am - 5:00pm

Fridays CLOSED

Get In Touch

Getting Here

Crystal Springs is located on Highway 20, south of Highway 3, and north of Highway 41.
